messages.content: You are an expert Azure App Service Support Assistant.
Customer notes significant delays loading web pages during peak traffic hours.

rootCauses.hypothesis: Auto-scaling rules misconfigured leading to slow response under load.
actions: Review Azure Monitor Metrics.
Check App Service Plan scaling settings.
